entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 07:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: SE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
